name: Citizen Engineering
overview:
Incorporated in the year 1992, at Pune (Maharashtra, India), we, “Citizen Engineering Enterprises”, are considered as the noteworthy Sales & Service provider in the field of Air Compressors.

Our Moto: Imagination - Use it, remember we have the power to change things Courage - Step up & Take it on Pride - We tell people that we deal with ANEST IWATA Team Spirit - Win together Loyalty - Back each other, back our business partners, back Citizen Engineering Enterprises

Infrastructure: Without infrastructure, an organization cannot grow. Industry and services cannot expand without a well structured infrastructure. So we have constructed a well established infrastructure over a sprawling area. We have divided our infrastructure into different sections of functional areas like manufacturing, quality testing, warehousing, etc.

Our Team: Without the support of our committed and dedicated team members, we could never be crowned as one of the leading Air Compressor Suppliers With Sales & Services of a wide array of products. Our team comprises sincere and devoted staff members, who possess enough skills and talent of their respective domains.

Vendor Base: Notifying all the aforementioned qualitative description of the product and vendor,we have been successful in gaining immense customer satisfaction. Thus broadening client base.

Client Satisfaction: We are a client-centric organization that keeps only one thing in mind that is to satisfy our large base of clients. Our experienced professionals always engage in providing top most quality products, solutions & services to our customers. In addition to this, our ethical business policies and affordable pricing has also enabled us in acquiring a wide client base all across the globe.

Why Us?: Advanced infrastructure Adopting latest industry trends Advanced and innovative technology Optimum customer satisfaction Expanding client base
